definitions.definition: ( UK law ) Someone who commits buggery ; a sodomite .
examples: The British Sexual Offences Act of 1967 is a buggers ’ charter.

definitions.definition: ( slang , derogatory , Commonwealth , Hawaii ) A foolish or worthless person or thing; a despicable person.
examples: He's a silly bugger for losing his keys.
The bugger ’s given me the wrong change.
My computer's being a bit of a bugger .

definitions.definition: ( slang , Commonwealth , Hawaii ) A situation that is aggravating or causes dismay ; a pain .
examples: So you're stuck out in the woop-woop and the next train back is Thursday next week. Well, that's a bit of a bugger .

definitions.definition: ( slang , Commonwealth , Hawaii ) Someone viewed with affection; a chap .
examples: How are you, you old bugger ?

definitions.definition: ( slang , dated ) A damn , anything at all.
examples: I don't give a bugger how important you think it is.

definitions.definition: ( slang , Commonwealth ) Someone who is very fond of something
examples: I'm a bugger for Welsh cakes.

definitions.definition: ( slang , UK , US ) A whippersnapper , a tyke .
examples: What is that little bugger up to now?

secondary_definitions: ( UK law ) Someone who commits buggery ; a sodomite .
( slang , derogatory , Commonwealth , Hawaii ) A foolish or worthless person or thing; a despicable person.
( slang , Commonwealth , Hawaii ) A situation that is aggravating or causes dismay ; a pain .
( slang , Commonwealth , Hawaii ) Someone viewed with affection; a chap .
( slang , dated ) A damn , anything at all.
( slang , Commonwealth ) Someone who is very fond of something
( slang , UK , US ) A whippersnapper , a tyke .

definitions.definition: One who sets a bug ( surveillance device ) ; one who bugs.

main_definition: One who sets a bug ( surveillance device ) ; one who bugs.
